title: The Republic of the Seychelles Act
title_en: The Republic of the Seychelles Act
description: Category: statute | Source: https://laws.moj.gov.jm/library/statute/the-republic-of-the-seychelles-act | Legal areas: Citizenship and Nationality

provisions.title: Section 1
provisions.content:
1. This Act may be cited as the Republic of The Seychelles Short title.
Act, 1979.

provisions.title: Section 2
provisions.content:
2. In this Act-                                                     Interpre-
                                                                      tation.
    “existing law” means all law which, whether being a
         rule of law or a provision of an Act of Parliament
         or of any other enactment or instrument whatso-
         ever, is in force on the 28th day of June, 1976, or
        has been passed or made before that date and
         comes into force thereafter;
    “Minister” means the Minister for the time being
         responsible for foreign affairs;
    “Parliament” means the Parliament of Jamaica.

provisions.title: Section 3
provisions.content:
3.41) On and after the 28th day of June, 1976, all ex- Operation
                                                              of existing
isting laws shall, unless and until provision to the contrary Irrw.
is made by Parliament or some other authority having power
in that behalf, and subject to subsection (2), have the same
operation in relation to the Republic of The Seychelles, and
persons and things belonging to or connected with the
Republic of The Seychelles as it would have apart from this
subsection if The Seychelles had not become a republic.
       (2) The Minister may, by order, make such adapta-
tions in any enactment passed before or after the 28th day
of June, 1976, or in any instrument having effect under
any such enactment, as appear to him necessary or expedient
in consequent of The Seychelles having become a republic,
and any such order may, though made after the 28th day
of June, 1976,be made so as to have effect from that date.
       Phe inclusion of tbis page is authorized by L.N. 57/1980]
              REPUBLIC OF THE SEYCHELLES
      (3) Every order made under subsection (2) shall be
subject to negative resolution.
      D’he inclusion of this page is authorized by L.N. 57/1980]
